name: Distant (fjasonlie)
description:
Use WASD or arrow keys to move, Z to interact with objects. You can interact with some objects by walking towards it.

Gameplay is around 10-20 minutes. This game contains 2 endings, 1 is a secret ending.

Context : In a society full of robots, one found an underground cult that summoned the Devil.

This is my second project made with GB Studio. Feedback is welcomed. ✨ 

Secret Hint: The secret path is on the corner of the street.
